descriptions:
Introducing the oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set - the perfect addition to your kitchen! Made from BPA free, food grade silicone, these utensils are safe and odorless, ensuring that they won't react with your food or beverages. 

Our silicone cooking utensils are designed to withstand temperatures up to 446°F, making them perfect for all your cooking, baking, and mixing needs. Say goodbye to melted utensils and hello to our heat-resistant, non-melting, wooden handle. The smooth and comfortable wooden handle prevents heat transfer and keeps your hands safe from burns. 

Cleaning up after a meal has never been easier! The one-piece design with a stainless steel core means no gaps for food to get trapped in, making these utensils a breeze to clean. However, please note that these utensils are not suitable for prolonged soaking in water or dishwasher cleaning due to the wooden handle. 

With 14 pieces included in this set, you'll have all the tools you need to fully meet the needs of your kitchen. From a deep soup ladle to a flexible spatula, our utensils are designed to protect the surface of your non-stick cookware from scratches. No more wasting money on individual utensils - get everything you need in one convenient set.
